title: Assistive Feeding System
description: A 3D printed 6 DOF care giver serial robotic manipulator for feeding food to patients, elderly and the disabled. Successfully fed rice to 3 test subjects.

details.summary: An assistive feeding system using a 3D-printed 6-DOF robotic arm with hybrid vision system for mouth detection and food delivery.
details.contributions: Team Lead, Embedded System (Programming & Electronics) & 3D printing

title: Optical Fiber Sorting Robot
description: A robotic system designed for sorting optical fibers with 250 microns precision increasing throughput by 87%.

details.summary: Precision robotic system for optical fiber sorting with micron-level accuracy.
